readme:
# Tarocchi-coffee package

## Introduction
This is an autocompletion program that could predict what function you may call for your java project based on machine learning algorithm.

_Be sure_ that your python has [**requests**](http://docs.python-requests.org/en/master/) module or you need to specify your python path which has **requests** module in setting.

You need to connect the network in University of Michigan to get access to the server. If you are off campus, please use [VPN in U of M](http://its.umich.edu/enterprise/wifi-networks/vpn).

## Usage
All you need is just to toggle the tarocchi-coffee package in context menu or on the toolbar (Package>tarocchi-coffee>Toggle) or press ctrl-alt-o.

A message of connecting server successfully would be occurred and telling you the prediction is fetched from server afterwards. Next just select the function you need or press tab to autocomplete the function if the prediction is correct.

![tarocchi-coffee demo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hengjia/tarocchi-coffee/master/tarocchi-demo.gif)

## Details
* [Requests module in python](http://docs.python-requests.org/en/master/) is needed. If your default python doesn't have this module, [install it](http://docs.python-requests.org/en/master/user/install/#install).
~~~
pip install requests
~~~
![setting default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hengjia/tarocchi-coffee/master/setting-default.png)
Or specify the python which has this module in setting. You can use the command
~~~
which python3
which python
~~~

  ![setting default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hengjia/tarocchi-coffee/master/which_python.png)

  ![setting default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hengjia/tarocchi-coffee/master/setting-customized.png)
* This package is based on [_autocomplete-plus_](https://github.com/atom/autocomplete-plus).

## Environment
* This package is available on OS-X system as soon as you have installed requests module for python. Tests on Windows and linux are not yet done.


## License
[MIT](https://github.com/hengjia/tarocchi-coffee/blob/master/LICENSE.md) Â© [Hengjia Zhang](https://github.com/hengjia)

# Good luck!
